## ShadowFeatureParameters interface

Parameter used to control patching the standard material shader to ensure that the materials color isn't affected by the light direction, only valid for techniques that are "fill"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShadowFeatureParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [removeDiffuseLight](./harp-materials.shadowfeatureparameters.removediffuselight.md) | boolean | Whether the diffuse light component is removed (i.e. the materials color is therefore just the ambient + shadow). |
